name: Seekers: Quidditch Trials
description:
Seekers is a WIP free game based on the sport Quidditch within the world of Harry Potter (This is a fan project and not endorsed by or affiliated with Warner Bros or JK Rowling)

The aim of the game is simple. Catch the snitch and return to the center of the quidditch pitch. 

Play in three varying difficulties and test your skills in timed mode to see if you can catch the snitch before your opponent gets to it first!

Controls: 

W - Accelerate

S - Decelerate

F - Sprint

G - Catch

Escape - Pause

Turn - Mouse Movement
